price: (19) And much war booty which they will take. And ever is Allāh Exalted in Might and Wise.
arabic: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةٗ يَأۡخُذُونَهَاۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamaghānima kathīratan yakhudhūnahā wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
